org.sakaiproject.conditions.api

Interface Rule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NotificationAction, org.apache.commons.collections.Predicate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRule, ResourceReleaseRule

    public interface Rule
extends org.apache.commons.collections.Predicate, NotificationAction
    A Rule extends org.apache.commons.collections.Predicate and decorates it with an enum that represents the relationship among the Predicates within the rule: the Predicates that make up a rule are either AND'd together or OR'd together. A Rule is also a Command, which means it has an execute method that can be invoked to perform some action.
    Author:
    Zach A. Thomas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Rule.Conjunction
      A Rule may have an AND relationship among its Predicates, or it may have an OR.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.commons.collections.Predicate

        evaluate

      • Methods inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.event.api.NotificationAction

        getClone, notify, set, set, toXml
